pageContext.description: Labels/Markings: v. old stained adhesive label: "Celt from Broadoak Downs ...........",   Typology: pronounced lozenge profile, but stop somewhat diffuse now. no trace of decn. left on face or sides.,   Manufacture: poss. small trace of orig. e.ber.,   Condition: butt damaged - even extant corner is flat-filed; c.e. very blunt;
pageContext.surface: dull gold brown; substantial areas pallid green, also light green pocks; substantial scoring/filing all over - no anc. sur. left
pageContext.other: Modern card, fields do not match data entry template
pageContext.publications: a) P.S.A.L. V (sec.), 1873, 424 (exhibited),b) PRBA Bronze Age portfolio - sketch & annotation
pageContext.collection: Private:,in 1873: T.Q. Couch Esq. FSA. (exhibited at Society of Antiquities.)
